query:
SELECT c.id, c.status, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM agentActivities WHERE campaignId = c.id) as activity_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM generatedContent WHERE campaignId = c.id) as content_count
FROM campaigns c 
ORDER BY c.id DESC 
LIMIT 1;

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM generatedContent WHERE campaignId = c.id) as content_count
